import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL='http://localhost:8000/api';// Configure axios to include auth token
axios.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization=`Token ${token}`;}return config;});// User API
export const userAPI={register:async data=>{const response=await axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/users/register/`,data);return response.data;},login:async data=>{const response=await axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/users/login/`,data);return response.data;},getProfile:async()=>{const response=await axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/users/me/`);return response.data;}};// Auth API (alias for userAPI)
export const authAPI=userAPI;// Profiles API (alias for userAPI)
export const profilesAPI=userAPI;// Skill API
export const skillsAPI={getAll:()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/skills/`),getSkills:params=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/skills/`,{params}),create:data=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/skills/`,data),createSkill:data=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/skills/`,data),update:(id,data)=>axios.put(`${API_BASE_URL}/skills/${id}/`,data),delete:id=>axios.delete(`${API_BASE_URL}/skills/${id}/`),deleteSkill:id=>axios.delete(`${API_BASE_URL}/skills/${id}/`)};// Swap Request API
export const swapRequestsAPI={getAll:()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/swap-requests/`),create:data=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/swap-requests/`,data),accept:id=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/swap-requests/${id}/accept/`),reject:id=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/swap-requests/${id}/reject/`)};// Swaps API (alias for swapRequestsAPI)
export const swapsAPI=swapRequestsAPI;// Chat API
export const chatsAPI={getAll:()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/chats/`),getChats:()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/chats/`),getMessages:chatId=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/messages/?chat_id=${chatId}`),createMessage:data=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/messages/`,data)};// Meeting API
export const meetingsAPI={getAll:()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/`),getMeetings:()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/`),create:data=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/`,data),createMeeting:data=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/`,data),start:id=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/${id}/start/`),startMeeting:id=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/${id}/start/`),join:id=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/${id}/join/`),joinMeeting:id=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/${id}/join/`),end:id=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/${id}/end/`),cancel:id=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/meetings/${id}/cancel/`)};// Messages API
export const messagesAPI={getMessages:chatId=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/messages/?chat_id=${chatId}`),createMessage:data=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/messages/`,data)};// Notification API
export const notificationsAPI={getAll:()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/notifications/`),markAsRead:id=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/notifications/${id}/mark_as_read/`),markAllAsRead:()=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/notifications/mark_all_as_read/`),getUnreadCount:()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/notifications/unread_count/`),clearAll:()=>axios.delete(`${API_BASE_URL}/notifications/clear_all/`)};
